trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> that holds the content of an XPS document.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> che include il contenuto di un documento XPS.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> that comprises one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> contiene un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> che include uno o pi√π <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor is passed a reference to a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> costruttore viene passato un riferimento a un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> per la scrittura, l'archiviazione e lettura di elementi di contenuto del documento.

trans-unit.source: A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is created by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo vuoto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> viene creato utilizzando il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is opened by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto esistente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> viene aperto con il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> radice viene aggiunto a un oggetto vuoto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, or on individual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements that are stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> gli elementi con le informazioni della stampante e il controllo possono anche essere associati il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, o nei singoli <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elementi archiviati nel <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] vedere XML Paper Specification (XPS) per il download all'indirizzo [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene inoltre illustrato come creare e chiudere un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> to the package and returns a writer.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> radice al package e restituisce un writer.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] fixed-document sequence writer for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Il writer della sequenza di documenti statici di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Anche se questa classe viene utilizzato un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> pu√≤ essere un set (sequenza) di uno <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o pi√π documenti.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method to insert content into an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> metodo per inserire contenuto in un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The format of the image.
trans-unit.target: Formato dell'immagine.

trans-unit.source: Adds a thumbnail image to the package.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge al package un'immagine in anteprima.

trans-unit.source: The newly added <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> appena aggiunto.

trans-unit.source: Closes the XPS document <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiude l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> del documento XPS.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> √® stato aperto per l'accesso in scrittura, dati i buffer vengono scritti nell'archivio e il documento fisico <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> viene chiuso.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Close%2A> has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Close%2A> √® stato chiamato, nessuna parte del documento sono accessibili con questa <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to open, insert content, and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come aprire, inserire il contenuto e chiudere un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to open, write to, and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene inoltre illustrato come aprire, scrivere e chiudere un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the core <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties" /> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties" /> principale del documento di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The core properties of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /><see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: Le propriet√† principali del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to write.
trans-unit.target: Il documento di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] da scrivere.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> for writing an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> per la scrittura di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> to use for writing the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> da utilizzare per la scrittura del documento di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> method in order to write an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> metodo per scrivere un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per rilasciare sia le risorse gestite sia quelle non gestite; <see langword="false" /> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> and optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite utilizzate da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> e, facoltativamente, rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose()` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro √® true, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> riferimenti.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo richiama il metodo `Dispose()` di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: Other objects can call <see langword="Dispose" /> multiple times.
trans-unit.target: Gli altri oggetti possono chiamare <see langword="Dispose" /> pi√π volte.

trans-unit.source: When you override <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando esegue l'override <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, non fare riferimento a oggetti gi√† eliminati in una precedente chiamata a <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su come implementare <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, vedere [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [si esegue l'override del metodo Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> per la lettura del documento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> per la lettura del documento.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Anche se questa classe viene utilizzato un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> pu√≤ essere un set (sequenza) di uno <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o pi√π documenti.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.FixedDocumentSequenceReader%2A> in order to access <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> parts in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come ottenere un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.FixedDocumentSequenceReader%2A> per accedere a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> parti un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fixed-document sequence at the root of the package.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la sequenza di documenti statici alla radice del package.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> of the package.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> del package.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Anche se questa classe viene utilizzato un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> pu√≤ essere un set (sequenza) di uno <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o pi√π documenti.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is readable.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il package √® leggibile.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the package is readable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il package √® leggibile, altrimenti <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package can be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se √® possibile applicare la firma digitale al package.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the package can be signed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il package pu√≤ essere firmato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is writable.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il package √® scrivibile.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the package is writable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il package √® scrivibile, altrimenti <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The signature that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Firma eliminata.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a signature from the package.
trans-unit.target: Elimina una firma dal package.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un insieme delle firme di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] associate al package.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> objects that represent the signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> che rappresentano le firme associate al package.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Signatures%2A> list identifies what parts are signed and whether the signatures are valid.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Signatures%2A> elenco identifica le parti firmate e se le firme sono valide.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Firma una raccolta di parti del pacchetto usando un certificato X.509 specificato.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <see langword="null" /> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: Certificato X.509 da utilizzare per la firma di ogni parte. In alternativa, <see langword="null" /> per richiedere all'utente di selezionare un certificato installato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per archiviare il certificato nel package; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts must be excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Flag che indicano le parti dipendenti da escludere dalla firma.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Firma una raccolta di parti di pacchetto usando un certificato X.509 specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> contenente informazioni sulla firma.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` √® `null`, viene visualizzata una finestra di dialogo che consente all'utente di selezionare un certificato x. 509 installato, ad esempio da un lettore di smart card.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <see langword="null" /> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: Certificato X.509 da utilizzare per la firma di ogni parte. In alternativa, <see langword="null" /> per richiedere all'utente di selezionare un certificato installato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per archiviare il certificato nel package; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts are excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Flag che indicano le parti dipendenti escluse dalla firma.

trans-unit.source: The ID to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: ID da assegnare alla firma.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Firma una raccolta di parti del pacchetto usando un certificato X.509 specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> contenente informazioni sulla firma.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` √® `null`, viene visualizzata una finestra di dialogo che consente all'utente di selezionare un certificato x. 509 installato, ad esempio da un lettore di smart card.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <see langword="null" /> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: Certificato X.509 da utilizzare per la firma di ogni parte. In alternativa, <see langword="null" /> per richiedere all'utente di selezionare un certificato installato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per archiviare il certificato nel package; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts to exclude from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Flag che indicano le parti dipendenti da escludere dalla firma.

trans-unit.source: The ID to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: ID da assegnare alla firma.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to verify that <see cref="P:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable" /> is <see langword="true" /> before signing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per verificare che <see cref="P:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable" /> sia <see langword="true" /> prima della firma; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Firma una raccolta di parti di pacchetto usando un certificato X.509 specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> contenente informazioni sulla firma.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box is presented that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` √® `null`, viene visualizzata una finestra di dialogo che consente all'utente di selezionare un certificato x. 509 installato, ad esempio da un lettore di smart card.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if `certificate` is `null` and no certificates are installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> viene generata se `certificate` √® `null` e nessun certificato √® installato.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro supporta l'infrastruttura di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Usare invece il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> indipendente dai tipi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'immagine in anteprima di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] associata al documento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> that represents the thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> che rappresenta l'immagine in anteprima associata al documento.
